competitors.name: New Relic
competitors.notes: Closest full replacement with application monitoring, infrastructure monitoring, and log management

competitors.name: Dynatrace
competitors.notes: Full-stack monitoring with AI technology (Davis AI engine)

competitors.name: Splunk
competitors.notes: Platform for machine-generated data with strong log management

competitors.name: SolarWinds
competitors.notes: Quick and easy setup with multiple APIs

context: By 2015, Datadog had established itself in the cloud monitoring space. The competitive landscape included established players like New Relic, Dynatrace, AppDynamics, and Splunk.
